E guarda te que am le spatum no toques la tunica cornea e que avengua en lu ruptura, e que la pupilla sia perforada.	And beware that with the spatula you do not touch the corneal membrane, and even if there is a rupture in it, and that the pupil is not pierced.
Aprop la inscizio geta en le huel un pauc de sal trissa o di cief fayt de siniar, e leyssa aquel entro al autre dia; e aprop cura aquel am aquo que cove entro que sia sanat.	Near the incision make a small cut on the skin with salted iron or steel made from tin, and leave that inside another day; then cure that as it heals.
E si la ungla no es nervoza e no podes metre la agulha, ni es ficada en aquela le onci, lahoras motas veguadas aquesta specia de ungla es curada am medicinas, e es sanada ayssi cum yeu e recomtat en la divisio.	If the wound is not nervous and you cannot put in the needle, then apply this kind of dressing with medicines, and it will be healed as recommended in the division.
E si tu vols inscindir aquela, lahoras tu obre le huel del malaute e pren spatum subtil leon de freul acuitat segon aquesta forma:	If you want to incise it, then open the space of the patient and take a thin slice of fresh lemon according to this form:
am subtilitat.	with subtlety.
E si vezes que aquela es rarificada e es confugida e empren en aquela razit, lahoras distilla de la tua ora en le huel de cief fayt de siniar o am cief rog o am sal trissat, e opila le huel entro a l’autre dia.	And if you see that it is rarified and congested and embedded in that mass, then distill from your mouth into the wound of iron made from tin or with rusty iron or salted steel, and cover the wound with another day.
E aprop itera sobre aquela la operacio entro que sia remaugut tot aquo que es de lu, sino que·l contrari apostema caut sia en le huel, quar lahoras tu leyssa aquela, e cura al comensament la apostema entro que sia sanat.	Then repeatedly perform the operation until all that is from it is removed, otherwise if a carbuncle forms in the wound, then leave it, and cure the carbuncle as it heals.
E aprop itera la tua operacio sobre aquela am razo entro que sia sanat.	And then repeat your operation as much as necessary until it is healed.
La emenencia de la carn lacrimal, si notz en le huel per gran nocument, sia suspendut am onci; e inscideys aquela de aquela una partida, e no ultimes la inscizio per so que no inscidesqua fluxs de lagremas.	The gland of the tear duct, if noted to be in great distress, should be suspended with a needle; and incise that part, but do not complete the incision so as not to cut off the flow of tears.
E aprop distilla en le lacrimal cief rog e fayt de siniar entro que sia sanat.	And then let the tear duct drip with a cloth and keep it moist until it is healed.
Capitol .xvii.	Chapter XVII.
De inscizio de alguazardenic e de aquo que es nascut de carn ajustada en le huel.	On the incision of the salivary gland and what is derived from flesh pressed against it.
Alcunas veguadas en les huels de alcus es nascuda carn roga, e es sobre-pausada entro que cobre la pupilla, o apropinqua o estrenh sobre las palpebras e fort leu comprem las palpebras a las partidas deforo e es assemblada a roza de balaustra. The operation in this case is that the patient places their head in a slight incline; then open the eyelids and remove all that flesh with appropriate incisions using forceps or tongs; then incise the flesh at the beginning, ensuring it is complete with the incisor, and carefully keep the incised parts to ensure you do not lose any during your operation.

So when your incision is completed and the entire flesh is cauterized, then fill the wound with brine, or sprinkle on it powdered substances resembling those of corrosive medicines, and place over the wound externally as a piece of burnt cork until an abscess is assured.

And if there is any cause of necrosis and it is seared with cauterization, and you fear an abscess, then leave the wound open and treat that abscess with what will heal that abscess, and repeatedly perform on that area until it is healed, and similarly do in the flesh adjusted which you have encountered in the wound of this kind.
Mays empero tu cove que alienes tota curacio del huel freul per via natural o per via accidental, obran am ferr, e no metas la tua ma en alcuna de aquestas operacios entro que veges que aquel membre sia suffertant aquela operacio.	Nevertheless, you must ensure that all healing of the wound by natural means or by accident occurs through iron, and do not place your hand in any of these operations until you see that that limb is suffering from that operation.
Capitol .xviii.	Chapter XVIII.
De colleccio de sabel en le huel.	From the collection of knowledge in the whole.
Sabel so venas rogas las quals son testudas sobre le huel e prohibeysso al vesement la sua operacio, e develican le huel am longitut de dias.	Knowledge so veins rogues which are rough on the whole and prohibit their operation, and expand the whole for a length of days.
Donc necessari es al comensament que tu consideres si le huel en le qual es sabel es fort e en lu no es autra malautia que sabel, lahoras tu colligeys aquel sabel.	Therefore, at the beginning, you must consider whether the whole in which knowledge is present is strong and contains only that knowledge, then you collect that knowledge.
E es que tu comandes al malaute que pause le sieu cap en le tieu se, e aprop suspen aquelas venas am un onci o am dos segon la tua prudencia; e sia aquel onci de subtil duplicacio segon aquesta forma:	And you command the patient to place his head in the heat bath, and then suspend those veins at one or two inches according to your prudence; and let that inch be of subtle double folding according to this form:
o so dos oncis gradantment en un cos segon aquesta forma:	or two inches gradually in one piece according to this form:
E aprop sian colligidas aquelas venas am forses subtils, am subtilitat, e abstergeys le sanc hora aprop hora, entro que vegas aquelas venas esser remaugudas del huel e sian revolgudas.	And let those veins be collected with forces subtle, in subtlety, and cleanse the wound hour by hour, while you see those veins being raised from the whole and rotated.
E guarda te que tu no ledes le huel am las extremitatz del spatum; e si’ la tua operacio en le miegjorn denant le solelh, e sias mot ferm en la tua operacio que no inscidas sino aquelas venas.	And be sure that you do not touch the outer parts of the patient's mouth; and if your operation in the morning before the sun, and remain firm in your operation that you enter only those veins.
E quan tu auras complitz, lahoras tu distilla en le huel cief vert o rog per que am sa acuitat corrodesca aquo que es remaugut del sabel.	And when you have completed, then distill in the whole vein or herb so that its acidity corrupts what is retained in the bladder.
Mays si aquo no es a tu possible colligeys tot en aquela hora, e lahoras tu emplastra tot am aquo que cede la dolor de lu, e leyssa lu per alcus dias entro que sia sedada la dolor de lu e que sia asegurat de apostema caut.	But if this is not possible for you to collect entirely in that hour, then plaster the whole with what relieves its pain, and let it be for a few days until its pain subsides and an abscess is secured.
E aprop itera sobre lu segon que la mateyssa manieyra entro que sia sanat.	And repeatedly work on it according to the manner of the wound as it heals.
E aquesta es la forma de las forfexs:	And this is the method for abscesses:
Capitol .xix.	Capitol.xix.
De reduccio de arizati al nas.	On the reduction of tonsillitis in the nose.
Quan tu curas arisati am cauteri o am medicina aguda comburent segon que es precedida la narracio de lu e no es sanat, lahoras no es engen en lu sino que fendas sobre le apostema deves la maturitat de lu, e que extraguas tota la humiditat la qual es en lu e·l poyre entro que sia descubert le os.	When you cure tonsillitis with a cautery or with sharp burning medicine, according to whether the narration of it precedes and is not healed, then do not engage in it but instead cut over the abscess to bring about its maturity, and extract all the moisture which is within it and let the pus out until the bone is uncovered.
E donc cum es descubert le os e vezes en lu corrupcio o negror, lahoras tu ratz lu am un sturment del qual aquesta es la forma:	And since the bone and veins within it are corrupted and blackened, then you must treat it with an instrument of which this is the form:
E es nompnat de aspre cap, e sia feyt de fer indi, e sia le cap redon ayssi cum asir le qual sia fayt punctat per punctacio de lima o aliskalfati per punctacio subtil (ayssi cum es en la forma seguent).	And it is named aspre cap, and made of iron, and has a round head such that this head is made punctured by the filing of a file or smoothed with a fine point (as in the form following).
E pausa aquel sobre le loc corrumput del os, e aprop revolveys aquel entre les tieus ditz, e prem la tua ma petit a petit entro que sapias que aquela corropcio es rasa.	And place it over the corrupted part of the bone, and then rotate it between your tongs, and press your hand gradually into the area until you know that the corruption is superficial.
E aquo sia fayt alcunas veguadas, e aprop restaura le loc am causas exsiccativas e stipticas.	And do this several times, and then restore the area caused by drying and astringent conditions.
Donc si·l loc es consolidat e es en lu nascuda bona carn e es abscindit le cors de la sania e roman per xl dias, e no es renovat e no es apostemat e no accideys en lu accident, lahoras tu sapias que es sanat.	Then if the area is consolidated and there is good hidden flesh, and the wound of the body from the pus is closed for 40 days, and does not reappear or become suppurative and no accident occurs, then you know that it is healed.
E sino, lahoras no es en lu engen sino reduzir la fissura a la forma del nas, e segon aquesta manieyra: e es que tu descuebras de segon os am ferr o am medicina acuta, e cum sira descubert le os, lahoras tu pren tribo segon aquesta forma:	And if not, then reduce the fissure to the shape of the nose, and according to this method: you should uncover the bone with iron or sharp medicine. Once the bone is uncovered, then take hold according to this form:
Sia la extramitat de lu ferr triangulada, e·l fust de lu sia prim extenuat entro a la extremitat ayssi cum vezes assi.	Let the extremity of the tool be triangular, and the shaft thereof be thickened at the extremity as you see.
E aprop pausa aquel sobre le os, e sia aquel prop del lacrimal; e alongua la tua ma un pauc del huel, e aprop revol la tua ma am le tribo entro que penetre tot le os, e aquel sente le malaute per asso que atroba vent yssir per so quan te la sua ma.	And then place that [tool] on the bone, and it should be near the lacrimal; extend your hand a little forward, and then rotate your hand in the groove until the entire bone is penetrated, and that which feels the pain through the air that escapes when you move your hand.
Donc lahoras restaura le loc am medicinas stipticas exsiccantz ayssi cum t’e eyssenhat.	Then restore the area with drying styptic medicines as they have been prescribed.
Donc cum nays la carn e·l loc es endurazit, lahoras la materia la qual effundia a las partidas deforo retorna al nas, donc aquo es pus leugier sobre le malaute.	Then, since the flesh is dried and the area is hardened, the matter which was exuding from the parts outside returns to the nose; therefore, this is lighter for the pain.
Capitol .xx.	Chapter 2..xx.
De reduccio de la eminencia del huel.	On the reduction of the prominence of the heel.
Quan le huel emineys am la sua totalitat e no accideys en le vezement nocument ni diminuacio, lahoras cove que laxas le malaute, e aprop que·l segues, e aprop que pausas ventozas en le cervitz ses scarificacio e succa per bona succaccio; e aprop pausa sobre le huel liniment le qual sia fayt de acatra e aloe e enses e sarcocolla, e aprop strenh le emplaustre sobre le huel am motz polvils.	When the heel protrudes completely and there is no damage or diminution of sensation, then you should relieve the pain, follow this by scarification on the neck with bleeding and good suction; then place a liniment made of acatra, aloe, enses, and sarcocolla over the heel, and strongly apply the plaster to the heel with pieces of cloth.
E la manieyra dels polvils es que prenguas draps de li leons motz, e quascun drap sia duplicat en quatre plecs; e fay de aquels motz.	And the manner of powders is that you take linen cloth, and each cloth be folded into four parts; and make thereof.
E aprop pausa aquels la un sobre le autre segon la quantitat de la qual ha le huel necessitat.	And then place them one over the other according to the quantity that it has to fill.
E aprop strenh sobre aquels am drap dur am fort strictura; e itera las ventosas am succio ses scarificacio; e aprop osta las ventosas e leyssa le huel streyt le dia e la nueyt.	And then tightly bind the cloths around them; and repeatedly apply the cups with suction several times; and then place the cups and leave it to draw for the day and night.
Mays si entretant le liguament es mollificat, lahoras cove que sia mot streyt.	More if meanwhile the ligature becomes softened, then make it tightly firm again.
E aprop osta le liament aprop le dia e la nueyt ayssi cum havem dit.	And then place the ligature during the day and night as we have said.
E si vezes le huel ja esser redusit, bo es, e sino, lahoras itera le emplastre am les polvils e la strictura e las ventosas entro que sia sanat.	And if the swelling has already been reduced, that is good. Otherwise, then repeatedly apply the plaster with the powders and the binding and cups until it is healed.
Capitol .xxi.	Chapter XXI.
De la inscizio de la eminencia de la tunica uvea.	On the incision of the prominence of the uveal tunic.
Quan endeve disrupcio en la tunica uvea, e aprop es eminent e procezeys fora las palpebras ayssi cum un gra de rasim, e es orrazada la forma de home per aquo, e vols aquo inscidir, lahoras la operacio en lu es ayssi cum havem recomtat, que tu entrometas la agula en la razitz de la uvea de la partida dejos en la partida desus, e aprop met la agula autra en la qual sia fil doble de la part del lacrimal, e fay aquela penetrar e leyssa la primieyra agula segon la sua disposicio; e aprop inscideys le loc del fiel doble e leva am aquel la partida de la uvea en le circuit de la agula, e strenh aquela mot.	When there is disruption in the tunica uvea, and it protrudes and proceeds outside the eyelids as if a degree of rash, and this forms the shape of a man through this, and you want to incise here, then the operation on it is as we have recommended, that you insert the needle into the slit of the uvea from the part left in the part above, and then place another needle with a double strand from the part of the lacrimal, and make that penetrate and leave the first needle according to its position; and then incise the location of the double strand and lift the part of the uvea in the circuit of the needle, and strengthen that movement.
E aprop extratz la agula e pausa sobre le huel lana infusa en album de huou e leyssa entro que cayha le fil am la uva.	Then extract the needle and place it over the hot wool infused with honey, letting the thread cool in the uvea.
E aprop cura le huel am aquo que conforte aquel entro que la plagua sia sanada.	Then apply the hot wool to this so that it comforts the area while the wound is healing.
E alcunas veguadas aduna de tota partida am cercle de drap entro le huel ajuste eminencia gran, e aprop sia perforat am le spatum subtil que vengua al preon del huel, e corra la humiditat albuginea, e descen le huel e intra tantost.	And sometimes gather all the parts in a circle of cloth around the hot wool, then place a fine perforation under the wool, which allows the humid and purulent moisture to flow out, and lower the wool so that it fits well.
E aprop strenh entro que sia sanat.	And then strengthen as it is healed.
Capitol .xxii.	Chapter XXII.
De curacio de alconati.	On the treatment of ulcers.
Aquesta malautia que es apelada alconati no es sino sania la qual es ajustada en le huel semblant a aygua dessendent e no es aquela.	This illness called an ulcer is nothing but a sore that appears similar to water descending and is not the other type.
Mays la manieyra del obrar en ela es que fasses le malaute sezer sobre la sela aparelada e dreyta, e aprop pren le cap sieu en las tuas mas de doas partz e mau aquel entro que veias la sania pervenir a las partidas dejos, e aprop sia siccada e no descenda, e sia ostat le lum, e·l malaute veia las causas ayssi cum vezia.	The method of treating it is to place the patient on a prepared and straight surface, then take the head in your hands at two parts and pull it gently until you see the sore begin to draw towards the extremities, ensuring it dries up completely and does not descend. Keep the light nearby so that you can observe the causes as they appear.
E si no descendra en jos, sapias que es aygua.	And if it does not descend to the feet, know that it is water.
Mays si no es preparat le descendement a la sania am aquo que havem dit, lahoras fay le malaute sezer entre las tuas mas e aprop pren spatum subtil e fen am aquel sobre le pannicol cernent un petit deves la continuacio de la conjunctiva am la tunica cornea en la corona (entro al loc vuet), entro que sia fora-getada la sania.	And if the descent of the sore is not prepared as we have said, then place the patient on their back and take a thin spatula. Apply it to the conjunctiva near the cornea in the socket (in the location indicated), so that the sore dries up completely.
Donc cum es fora-getada, lahoras tu distilla en le huel aygua cauda en la qual has mesclat mel o aygua en la qual ja has bulit fenugrec e mel.	Then, as is forgotten, when you distill into the full vessel of water in which you have mixed honey or water in which you have already boiled fenugreek and honey.
E aprop sia curat am las autras causas entro que sia sanat.	And then treat the other causes until it is healed.
Capitol .xxii.	Capitol.xxii.
De la curacio de la aygua descendent del huel.	Of the treatment of water descending from above.
Ja havem dit las specias de la aygua en la divisio e qual conveneys a perforar am sermo declarant, lahoras aquel segon la sanetat.	We have already mentioned the species of water in the division and which is appropriate to perforate when speaking, according to its suitability.
Lahoras cove que tu fassas sezer le malaute entre las tuas mas sobre un cayrat e lia le sieu huel sa, lu mot stringent.	Then you must fix the patient's thighs on a bench and tie the affected area tight.
E aprop pausa prop de la palpebra del sieu huel la tua ma senestra, si le huel en le qual es l’aygua es le huel senestra; o am la tua ma dreyta, si le huel es le dextre.	And then place your left hand near the eyelid of the affected area, if the affected area where the water is located is the left side; or with your right hand, if the affected area is the right side.
E aprop am la tua ma dextra pren almagda, si le huel es senestre; o am la tua ma senestra, si le huel es de dreyt.	And then with your right hand take the wad, if the side is left; or with your left hand, if the side is right.
E aprop pausa la extremitat de almagda prop de la corona per la grossesa del ray en le album del huel de part del mendre lacrimal, e aprop enpelleys almagda am vertut e revol la tua ma am aquel.	And then place the extremity of the thumb near the crown for the swelling of the eye from the excess of yellow bile in the white part of the eye socket, and then apply the thumb with virtue and rotate your hand there.
E aprop penetre en le album del huel e sentas que almagda ja es pervenguda a causa vueda.	And then penetrate into the white part of the eye and feel that the thumb has already been permeated by the vision.
E cove que sia la masura del cami de almagda al preon la mesura del spazi le qual es de la pupilla entro a la fi de la negror, e es la corona del huel; quar tu veyras am aquel pupilla am la visio de l’huel per la clartat de la tunica cornea.	And ensure that the size of the thumb's path is measured when pressing the space which is from the pupil to the edge of the black, for this is the crown of the eye; so you will see the pupil with the vision of the eye through the clarity of the corneal layer.
E aprop pausa almagda entro al loc en le qual es l’aygua, e aprop tu la atira en jos una veguada aprop autra, e donc si la aygua descen tantost, lahoras vetz le malaute aquo sobre le qual huebre la sua vista tantost, e almagda en le sieu huel.	And then place the thumb in the location where the water is, and then draw it down slightly a few times. Therefore, if the water descends quickly, then you see the patient below where his vision extends quickly, and the thumb in his eye.
E aprop repausa se un pauc; donc si la aygua es descenduda, lahoras tu depausa aquela autre veguada abantz que almagda ne sia getada.	And then rest for a moment; therefore, if the water has descended, then you continue with another downward motion before the thumb is fully inserted.
E donc quan es sicada e no descen, lahoras tu extrat almagda am facilitat, e revol am aquel la tua ma pauc a pauc, e aprop dissolveys en l’aygua un petit de sal clara de gemma e am aquela lava le huel dedintz; e aprop pausa fora le huel coto o stopa o lana infusa en oli rozat e album de huou e ligua am aquo le huel sa.	And when it has been drawn out and does not descend, then you extract the lump with ease, and roll it a little with your hand, and return it completely into the water a small amount of clear salted gemmy egg and with that wash the whole inside; and place outside the whole cloth or stop or infused wool in olive oil and yolk of egg and tie with that the whole cloth.
Mays nos e aquels que so de nostre temps pause sobre aquel comi trissat am album de huou.	May it and those who are of our times pause over it with olive oil.
E si no obezeys a tu almagda al intrament de l’huel per la sua duricia — quar es alcu dels homes del qual le huel es dur mot —, lahoras cove que prenguas le spatum le qual es nompnat alberid del qual aquesta es la forma:	And if your lump does not yield to the instrument of the cloth due to its hardness — which is often the case with some men whose skin is hard —, then cut that you take the spathe which is named albedid of which this is the form:
E donc perfora am aquel aquela conjunctura, e no ultimes la tua ma en le trauc, e no es si no que fassas via ad almagda loc subtil.	And then puncture at that joint, and do not withdraw your hand from the tract, but rather make way to the site of the lump.
E aprop entromet almagda segon que havem dit.	And then introduce the instrument as we have said.
E deves le compliment de la tua obra, sia preparat al malaute dormitori descentment fayt en le qual dorma sobre le sieu dos en mayson tenebrosa, e sia prohibit de totz movementz .	And you must complete your work, so prepare the patient's sleeping place decently made in which he lies on his back in a dark house, and prohibit all movements.
E pausa en la natura de lu aquo per que sia linida la sua natura, e no maugua le sieu cap a la partida dreyta ni senestra de tot.	And pause in the nature of the patient so that his nature is regulated, and do not let his head tilt to the right or left side during the procedure.
E sia le liament segon la sua disposicio entro al tertz dia.	And apply the ligature according to its disposition on the third day.
E aprop deslia aquel en aquela maysso tenebrosa e exproha la freol vista, e fay li vezer alcunas causas, e aprop retorna le liament entro al dia .vii.	And then remove that one in the darkest and most severe area, expose the raw wound, and make some incisions, and then return the ligature on the seventh day.
E no cove que fassas aquo en la hora de las curacios o tantost aprop la infusio.	And do not perform this during the hour of cure or soon after the infusion.
Habantz cove que tu alienes aquo per so quar la aygua puega leugierament per gran e vehement de reguardament.	And you should remove this so that the water can drain slightly due to its great and forceful position.
Mays si accideys apostema caut, lahoras cove que deslias le huel denant le vii dia, e rectifica aquel am aquo que ceda apostema.	And if an abscess should occur before the seventh day, then remove the pus on the seventh day, and adjust this to that which gives way to the abscess.
Lahoras tu absol la vista de lu e pausa sobre la cara de lu oral per le qual sia regit le vezement de lu dejos lu per alcus dias, lu existent en la mayszo tenebrosa.	And when you finish the wound, pause over the face of the wound for which the vision should be regulated, and let it exist in the most severe area for some days.
E aprop sia gitat de aquela mayzo gradantment e conversa8 en las suas causas.	And then it should be gradually withdrawn and changed into its causes.
E sapias que in alchatea no es excusat le discipol de visio alcunas veguadas, e lahoras tu sias ardit sobre la operacio.	And know that in surgery it is not excusable for the disciple to have some visions, and then you should be attentive to the operation.
E ja es pervengut a nos de alcu de aquels les quals so al Artach , e alcu disse que fayt foc en al Ayrac magdaam perforat am le qual es succada la aygua.	And we have learned from some of those who suffer from Artach that some say to make a fire in Ayrac magma and perforate it, in which the water is boiled.
Mays empero yeu non e vist degu en la nostra terra le qual haia perfeyt aquo, ni e aquo legit en alcu dels libres dels antics; e es possible que aquo sia novel.	But I have not seen anyone in our land who is perfect at this, nor is it mentioned in any of the ancient books; and it is possible that this is a new method.
E aquestas so las formas de las specias de magdaan per que sia sobre aquelas aquel le qual ignora aquelas:	And these are the forms of the species of magdaan so that he may know them:
E sian faytas de eram o de ferr propriament, e sian las extramitatz de lor am aquesta subtilitat triangulada, la extremitat aguda ayssi cum aquela es la forma.	And they should be made of silk or iron properly, and their ends should have this subtlety in the form of a triangle, with one sharp end similar to the other.
Capitol .xxiv.	Capitol. xxiv.
De la curacio de carn nada en le nas.	Of the treatment of flesh nothing in the nose.
Quan en le nas so nascudas carns diversas ajustadas de las quals es alcuna causa la qual es assemblada a scorpio de motz pes, o a polip peys; e aquesta malautia es apelada polipus quar es a semblansa de aquel peys representat.	When in the nose there arise various flesh masses from which arises some cause that is associated with a heavy object or a growth in the region; this illness is called polypus, which resembles that growth depicted.
E de lu es carn cancrosa, lapadea, de fusca color; e de lu es que es carn leon no de color fusca.	And the polyp is cancerous, dark in color; and from it comes flesh like a lion's, not of a dark color.
Donc en aquela que es en aquestas carns leon no fraudulenta ni cancroza, cove que fassas le malaute sezer entre las tuas mas e posat al solelh, e huebre las nars de lu, e picoys le tieu onci en aquelas carns.	Therefore, in that which is among these lion-like flesh masses that are neither fraudulent nor cancerous, cut the illness away between your thighs and place it in the sun, and rub the nostrils with it, and apply a paste of it to those flesh masses.
E aprop extrat aquela a las partidas deforo, e aprop inscindeys aquo que has comprehendut de aquelas am spatum agut subtil de la una partida entro que sapias que tota la carn ja es ostada; que si roman de lu deguna causa de la qual la abscisio es possibla, lahoras tu ratz aquo am la un dels estrumentz subtils am facilitat entro que de lu romangua denguna causa.	Then remove it to the openings, and carefully divide what you have grasped with a sharp thin instrument from which you can see that all the flesh has been reached; if any part remains due to some cause for which the division is possible, then quickly use one of the fine instruments to facilitate its division.
Mays si senhoreja am sanc o accida apostema caut, lahoras tu pausa a lu aquo que cove; o es dels apostemas malignes, lahoras tu coyta e cauteriza aquel entro que sia abscindit sanc e sian ostadas las cavas totas.	If the lord complains of pain or an infected abscess, then you place yourself near him where it is suitable; if it is a malignant abscess, then you incise and cauterize that area from which the pus is to be drained and all the cavities are to be opened.
E aprop sia getatz en le nas aprop la inscizio vi agre e aygua o vi.	And then insert something in the nose near the incision either powder or water.
Mays si le nas es ubert e de lu procezeys humiditat entro al palat, lahoras sapias que ja es sanat.	If the nose is opened and there is a process of humidity in the palate, then you know that it is already healed.
Mays si la humiditat no penetra segon que cove, lahoras tu sapias que dedintz lu es carn nada en los pus sobiras osses de las nars als quals non es pervengut abscizio.	If the humidity does not penetrate as it should, then you know that inside there is no pus and no bones of the nose for which incision has not been made.
Donc lahoras cove que entromitas fiel de li al qual sia alcuna grosseza, e nuza en lu motz nuzes, e pausa entre quascun nutz la quantitat del dit o mens, e engene le malaute e entromet una extremitat del fiel en le nars am lo ray o am autra causa la qual es a lu possibla.	Then, when it is appropriate that you insert a piece of the animal from which there is any lump, use nuts in its place, and place the quantity of a finger or less between each nut, and probe the patient and insert an extremity of the cord into the nose either with forceps or by another cause which is possible for him.
E pus que aquo aura fayt, que atire le sieu odorament entro que pervengua a las canals de las nars, e sia eyssit sobre le sieu golayro, quar tropas veguadas le semblant ad aquesta accio fan les enfantz a las scolas, e es leugiera causa ad aquel que ho vol far.	And after this has been done, let him breathe in the fumes thereof until they reach the nostrils' canals, and sit on his couch; for too much laughter at this action makes children cry at school, and it is a light reason for someone who wants to do so.
E aprop pausa las dos extramitatz del fiel, una extremitat que iesca sobre le nas et l’autra que romangua en le nas, e aprop aministra serratura de carn am les nuzes que so en le fiel, e fay aquo entro que sapias que las carn ja so am les nuzes del fiel.	Then place the two ends of the thread, one end that ties over the nose and the other that hangs in the nose, and then apply a flesh wound near the joints in the thread, doing this while you can tell that the flesh is on the joints of the thread.
E aprop extratz le fiel, e pausa en le nas aprop la abstraccio del sanc una calgua , e fay aquo per tres dias o mays entro que l’enguent corrodo tot aquo que es romas de las carns.	Then extract the thread, and place a clot near the opening of the nose, and do this for three days or more until the ointment dissolves everything that is rotting from the flesh.
E aprop en la fi de la causa, pausa en le nas una canula de plom per alscus jorns entro que sia sanat.	Then, at the end of the treatment, place a lead cannula in the nose for several days until it is healed.
Mays si endigeys de curacio que exsique, usa de aquela.	If you need to speed up the cure, use the other one.
E aquesta es la forma del instrument a capipurge fazedor am le qual son distillatz olis e medicinas en le nars:	And this is the form of the instrument for pouring oil and medicines into the nostrils:
E fay aquo de argent o de eram, la qual sia semblant a una petita lampesa uberta, ayssi cum petita conqua, e le meat semblantment.	And make it of silver or gold, which is similar to a small open lantern, like a small basin, and the mouth resembling.
E si vols, fay una canula clausa ayssi cum cana, e la cancula del estrument a capipurge fazedor e sia plana, descuberta; a la qual sia manubre en lo derier de lu, am le qual tenguas aquela quan escaufas en lu oli o aquo que tu vols dels sucs e de las causas suctiblas.	And if you wish, make a closed cannula like a reed, and the mouth of the instrument for pouring oil into the nostrils flat and open; place a handle at the rear end of it, with which you can hold it when you heat oil or what you want from the secretions and causes that are to be suctioned.
E aquestz capipurgi es precios: recipe de enforbi de castor, de balayra blanc, de giengiebre, e piletre de safra, de pebre lonc, de escafragia, de epetum de spic ana unc. vi cumfizeys am suc de bleda e de caul, e sian faytas pillulas, e sia destemprada una pillula am aygua tebeza, e sia gitat en las nars del malaute jasent envers.	And these instruments are precious: mix castor oil, white balata, gentian, safflower oil, long pepper, asafetida, and one uncia of myrrh gum; combine them with wheat juice and calamus juice, and make pillules. Then prepare one unctuous pill, moisten it with clear wine, and administer it into the nostrils of the patient lying on their side.
Capitol .xxv.	Chapter 25.
De theyls natz en las extramitatz del nas.	From the nostrils at the ends of the nose.
Motas veguadas es nat theyl en las extramitatz del nas, e es magnificat e omentat en alscus dias entro en que mot es leg le reguardament de lu.	Nodules appear in the nostrils at the ends of the nose, and these are enlarged and smoothed over in a few days as the swelling diminishes.
E per aquo cove que tu inscidas aquel en le comensament de la apparissio de lu, e erediques tot aquel.	And for this, you should enter that which is at the beginning of the appearance of the lesion, and eradicate all of it.
E aprop pausa sobre le loc o cauteri o medicina comburent la qual estia en loc de lu.	And place yourself over the area or the cautery or burning medicine where it was located.
Mays si es tardada la sua inscizio entro que sia magnificat, lahoras considera si es lapificat, dur, de fusca color e de pauc sentiment, lahoras no toques aquel am ferr quar es apostema crancos; quar motas veguadas ad aquel que inscideys aquesta apostema endeve per lu granda malicia sobre aquel le qual aquel havia.	But if the inflammation is delayed before it enlarges, consider whether it is hardened, dark in color, and has little sensation. In that case, do not touch that with a sharp instrument as it is an abscess; for nodules often accompany this abscess due to its great malice towards the area where it was located.
E si le apostema es de leon tocament e no es de fosca color, e vezes que inscizio es possibla en tot aquel, lahoras evacua le malaute e inscideys aquel senes temor, e cura le loc am aquo que exsique e costrenh entro que sia sanat.	And if the abscess is due to a blow and not dark in color, and the inflammation can occur throughout that area, then drain the poison and cut there without fear, and treat the area with what dries and constricts until it is healed.
Capitol .xxvi.	Chapter XXVI.
De sutura del nas e de las labias e de la aurelha quan la continuitat es dissolvuda per plagua o per semblantz.	For the suturing of the nose and lips when continuity is dissolved by ulcer or by similar conditions.
Sapias que quan accideys solucio de continuitat en una de aquestas cartillages, pauc confereys en aquela operacio sino en alcus homes.	Know that when there is dissolution of continuity in one of these cartilages, you should not rely much on that operation but rather on several skilled workers.
Donc cove, quan endeve ad alcu alcuna causa de aquelas, que consideres si es plagua fresca am le sieu sanc, e lahoras tu ajusta las doas labias de la plagua am sutura, e aprop cura aquel entro que sia sanat.	Then probe, when you have to deal with any of these causes, whether it is a fresh ulcer and its discharge, and then adjust the two edges of the ulcer with sutures, and proceed to cure that until it is healed.
E si las labias de solucio de continuitat so ja separadas, e quascuna es fayta sana, lahoras cove que tu excorjes quascuna partida de la sua codena apparent entro que n’iesca sanc.	And if the edges of the dissolution of continuity are already separated, and any one is made healthy, then probe that you should remove each part of its underlying tissue until it discharges pus.
E aprop ajusta las doas labias am sutura e strenh aquelas, e sobre aquelas pulveriza sanc de drago e enses trissat, e pausa sobre la polvera una pessa de emplaustra diafinicon, o de alcu autre dels emplastres consolidatius, e leyssa aquel liat per dos jorns o per tres, e aprop deslia aquel e permuta aquel emplaustre e leyssa aquel entro que·ls fiels per si sian abscinditz, e aprop cura am enguent entro que sia sanat.	Then adjust the two edges with sutures and strengthen them, and sprinkle dragon's blood powder and triple distilled vinegar over them, and place a piece of diaphonic plaster or another consolidated plaster on top of the powder, and leave this paste for two to three days. Then remove it and change the plaster, leaving it until the roots are absorbed, and proceed to cure with ointment until it is healed.
Mays la manieyra de la sutura es que tu agregues la solucio de continuitat o am agulhas ayssi cum havem recomtat en la sutura del ventre, o agregua la solucio de continuitat am fiel ayssi cum a tu e fayt saber.	The manner of suturing is that you add the solution of continuity or use needles as we have recommended in the belly suture, or add the solution of continuity with thread as you are made to know.
Capitol .xxvii.	Chapter XXVII.
De extraccio de aquela causas que veno en las doas labias en las partidas dedintz.	Of the extraction of those causes that venous problems occur in the two lips within the internal parts.
Motas veguadas endeve a motz homes en las partidas dedintz de las suas labias alcus apostemas durs semblantz a gras de errs, e alscunas de lors son mendres e alcunas son majors.	Patches appear in the internal parts of their lips, turning into hard abscesses resembling lard. Some are small, while others are larger.
Donc cove que tu convertas las labias e fendas quascuna de aquelas duricias de tota part, e aprop la abscizio umpliscas le loc de sagi trissat entro que·l sanc sia restrengut, e aprop sia lavat am vi agre e sia curat le loc am aquo que es stipticitat, entro que sia sanat.	Therefore, carefully incise all parts of the hard swellings in the lips and cavities, then fill the wound with three layers of cloth until the wound is tightened, and subsequently wash it with vinegar and treat the area with water that has astringent properties until it heals.
Capitol .xxviii.	Chapter XXVIII.
De inscizio de la carn ajustada en las gengivas.	Of the incision of flesh adhered to the gums.
Granre de veguadas nays sobre la gengiva carn ajustada la qual les antics apelero albulus, adonc cove que tu suspendas aquela am onci o que tenguas aquela am las forfecs e inscidas aquela deves la sua razit, e leyssas la sania correr o le sanc.	Great care must be taken over the gum attached to the flesh, which the ancients called albulus. Then extract that which you hold with one instrument and divide it carefully, and let the healthy blood flow or the venom.
E aprop pausa sobre le loc sagi trissat o autra polveras stipticas o excicativas.	Then place something warm on the area for about three minutes or another styptic or excitatory powder.
E si aquela carn retorna, lahoras inscideys aquela segundariament, e cauterisa aquela, quar aprop le cauteri no retornara.	And if that flesh returns, then divide it again, and cauterize it; for after the cauterization, it will not return.
Capitol .xxix.	Capitol.xxix.
De razo de dentz am ferr.	On the reason for teeth hurt.
Quan en la superficia de las dentz de las partidas dedintz e de las de foro e entre las gingivas so ajustadas escorsas aspras, legas, e alcunas veguadas son de nigradas e son faytas citrinas o vertz entro que a la gingiva ve per aquo corrupcio e son faytas las dentz legas.	When on the surface of the teeth that are split inside and outside, and between the gums, there appear sharp, hard edges, some times they are blackish and are caused by yellow or green deposits between the gums due to corruption, which cause the teeth to become loose.
E donc cove que tu fassas sezer le malaute entre las tuas mas e pausar le cap de lu en le tieu se, e ratz las dents en las quals apareysso aquelas escorsas e causas semblantz arena entro que de lor no romangua deguna causa, e aquo fay de la negror e de la citrinitat e de las autras entro que sian mondificadas.	And therefore make sure that you cut the patient's thigh between your thighs and place his head in the crook of your arm, and rub the teeth where these edges and similar causes appear with sand so that they do not break for any reason, and do this from blackness and yellowishness and other changes in them.
Donc si es ostat aquo que es en aquelas del comensament de la razio, bo es; e sino, lahoras tu itera la razio sobre aquelas al autra dia e al segon e al tertz entro que vengua al derier stament en aquo que tu vols.	So if what remains of the matter at the beginning of the reasoning is clear, that is good; and if not, then you iterate the reasoning to those matters the next day and the second and the third until it comes to the final statement in what you want.
E sapias que las dentz han necessitat de motz rezoris de diversas formas e de motas figuras segon que es preparat a la tua operacio.	And know that teeth have needed to be extracted in various forms and with different figures according to how your operation is prepared.
E per so quar le razori am le qual la dent es raza de la partida dedintz es autre del razori am le qual es ras entre las dentz segon autras formas, e aquestas formas de razoris sian deves tu preparadas las quals veyras tantost:	And so, for that reason, the extractor used when the tooth is extracted from the inside is different from the extractor used when it is between the teeth according to other forms. These forms of extractors you should prepare, which you will often see.
Capitol .xxx.	Capitol.xxx.
D’eradicacio de dentz.	For the extraction of teeth.
Cove que tu cures la dent de la sua dolor am tot engen e tardes en tota eradicacio de lu, quar no es denguna causa que suplisqua la veguada de lu quan es eradicada, quar es sustancia sublima entro que es excusacio en la eradicacio de lu.	Cure the tooth with great skill and take your time in the entire extraction process, for no cause can compensate for its absence when extracted, for it is a substance that sublimes during the removal.
Mays cove quan le malaute es forsat aquela dent eradicar, que fermament deves tu sia certificat quala es la dent dolent, quar motas veguadas la dolor descep le malaute e cuga que sia en dent sana, e tu eradicas aquela e aprop la dolor no cessa entro que la dent malauta e dolent sia eradicada, quar nos ja havem vist aquo per operacio dels barbies.	When the patient is forced to remove a tooth, you must be certain which tooth is painful, checking several times where the pain originates and ensuring it is not in a healthy tooth. Once you extract the diseased and painful tooth, the pain generally ceases, for we have seen this through the operations of barbers.
Donc cum deves tu es sertificat qual es la dent dolent, e que o sabes be, lahoras cove que tu scarifiques en le circuit de la dent am spatum en le qual sia alcuna vertut, entro que sia dissolvut de la dent de la gingiva de tota partida, e aprop mau aquel am les tieus ditz, o am forfexs subtils al comensament petit a petit entro que aquela concucesquas.	Therefore, you must be certain which tooth is painful, and knowing this well, when you incise along the circuit of the tooth in the socket where any virtue lies, ensuring that it is dissolved from the entire part of the tooth and gum, then insert those tweezers or fine scissors gradually at the beginning, ensuring that the tissue dissolves.
E aprop alogua en lu fortz tenalhas grans per bona loquacio o estuptura fort, e pausa le cap del malaute entre les tieus denolhs que be le tengues que no·s maugua, e aprop tratz la dent segon rectitut en manieyra que no trenques aquela, ni al malaute major dolor no dones.	And then irrigate it well to strengthen the grip for good speech or strong fracture, and place the head of the patient between your hands so that you hold them securely without causing discomfort, and then extract the tooth in a straight manner so as not to break it, nor give the patient additional pain.
E donc si no es foro-getat, lahoras pren un de aquels instrumentz, e met aquel dejos lu de tota part am facilitat e esforsa la remocio de lu ayssi que es feyt al comensament.	And if it is not forced out, then take one of those instruments, and place it under the tooth with great ease and effort, ensuring its removal is done similarly to how it was initially placed.
Mays si la dent es trauquada o corrosa, lahoras cove que tu comples de drap aquel trauc e estrenguas aquel am la extremitat de ray subtil per so que no sia trinquada en la hora de la tua constriccio sobre aquela am tenalas.	If the tooth is broken or corroded, then you should fill that hole with cloth and tie it at the end of a fine thread to prevent it from breaking during your operation on that area.
E cove que tu obres exquesitament am scarificacio en le circuit de tota part de la gingiva e guarda mot la tua fortaleza que no trenques aquela e romangua partida de lu, e retorne sobre le malaute per la malicia que sia majo que la primieyra dolor de lu.	And you should operate exquisite[ly] with incision in the circuit of all parts of the gum and guard maintaining your strength so that you do not break that part of it, and return over the gout through its malice which is worse than the first pain of it.
E guarda te que no fassas aquo que fan alscus ignorantz barbiers en lor fistinacio e audacia sobre la eradicacio de lor, ses que no aministran aquo que nos havem recomtat; quar motas veguadas fan venir sobre les homes malautias grans las quals son pus dificils que sian trinquadas, e las razitz de lor remaugudas totas, o alcunas de aquelas, o que extrayguas aquela am alcus osses de la mandigula ayssi cum motas veguadas havem testificat.	And guard yourself that you do not do what some ignorant barbers do in their incisions and audacity regarding the eradication of gout; for they do not administer what we have advised. For spots and marks often bring great diseases upon men which are harder to break than broken bones, and the reasons for their failures all or some of them, or that you extract that part from certain bones of the mandible thus for spots and marks we have testified.
E aprop la eradicacio de lu sia lavada la boca am vi caut o vi agre am sal.	And for the eradication of gout, wash the mouth with wine or vinegar mixed with salt.
E si endeve fluxs de sanc per aysso, ayssi cum motas veguadas endeve, lahoras trissa alcuna quantitat de zegi e aspergeys sobre la plagua, e si no confereys aquel zegi, cauteriza.	And if bleeding occurs for this reason, as when small blisters appear, then take a little quantity of vinegar and sprinkle it over the wound, and if that vinegar does not stop it, cauterize.
La forma de las forceps e tenalas subtils am las quals es mauguda la dent al comensament sia de longua extramitat, de breu manubre e gros, per so que no sian doblatz quan am aquels deves obrar.	The shape of the forceps and delicate tweezers used to extract a tooth at the beginning should be long and straight, short and thick, so that they do not bend when those you need to use.
E sian ayssi cum vezes de gros manubre entro que quan estrenhas am aquelas no sian dobladas, sian breus extramitatz.	And they should be such that when you tighten them around those, they do not bend, and are long but thin.
E sian faytas de ferr de India descentment faytas de dreytas extramitatz, e en las extramitatz de aquelas sian dentz de las quals las unas intron en las autras e estrenhan per constriccio descent fort, e alscunas veguadas las extramitatz de aquelas sian la forma del bec d’un auzel le qual ha nom ciconia, so es guanta, e son de fort constriccio.	And they should be made of Indian steel, straight and long. At the ends of these, there are teeth such that one enters the other and tighten by descending construction firmly. Sometimes the ends of these are in the shape of a heron's bill, which is called a ciconia, and they are strongly constructed.
Capitol .xxxi.	Capitol.xxxxi.
De erradicacio de dentz e d‘estraccio dels osses de las mandibulas trincadas.	On the removal of teeth and the extraction of the bones from broken jaws.
Quan deves la eradicacio de dent le qual es trinquat roman alcuna causa, lahoras cove que tu pauses sobre le loc coto am boder per un jorn o per dos entro que·l loc sia mollificat; e aprop entromet algesti o tenalhas las extramitatz de las quals so asembladas al bec de un auzel apelat ciconia o guanta, la forma de las forceps:	When you need to remove a tooth that is broken for any cause, then you must place your hand over the area firmly for one or two days until the area becomes softened; and then insert probes or compresses at the extremities of which are attached to the beak of a bird called ciconia or gaunt, the shape of forceps:
Las extramitatz de lor sian faytas dedintz ayssi cum lima o alfagi.	The extremities of the probes should be made like a rasp orawl.
E si no obediys a tu a eyssiment am aquestas forceps o tenalas, lahoras cove que tu caves sobre la razit e descrobas tota la carn e entrometas le instrument le qual ha nom atali, so es palanca petita del qual la forma es aquesta:	And if the tooth does not obey to your attempt with these forceps or probes, then you must grasp the root and strip all the flesh away, and insert the instrument which is named atali, that is a small lever of which the shape is this:
E sia de breu extremitat grossa un petit, e no sia enbegut per so que no sia trinquat.	And briefly, the extremity should be slightly thick and not broken so that it is not broken.
Donc si per aquo la razit es foro-getada, bo es; e sino, ajuda te am aquestz autres instrument dels quals aquestas son las formas: la forma del primier instrument es de triangulada extramitat en la qual sia alcuna grossesa:	So if the root is broken, that is good; otherwise, help yourself with these other instruments of which these are the forms: the form of the first instrument is a triangular extremity in which there is some thickness.
La forma del segon instrument es que sia de triangulada e de pus subtil extremitat.	The form of the second instrument should be triangular and of very fine extremity.
E ja so ajudatz am aquest instrument havent dos ramps del qual aquesta es la forma aprop la seguent:	And now assist in this instrument having two ramps, of which this is the form and shape for the next:
e am autres instrumentz les quals precidero en rasura de dentz; quar juvament es fayt am aquest instrument le qual es asemblat a onci gran, e aquesta es la forma:	and there are other instruments which are used for scraping teeth; so this instrument is made like a large spoon, and this is its form:
de la triangulada extremitat torta o curta, la qual sia alcuna grossesa, e no sia enbegut per so que no sia trinquat.	from the triangular bent or short extremity, which is of certain thickness, and not too deep so as not to pierce.
E otra sapias que·ls instrumentz de las dentz motz so e semblantment les autres instruments.	And another spatula that the instruments for the teeth use is similar to other instruments.
Mays le artifexs savi e subtil en l’art, atroba per si mateys segon aquo que a lu significa la operacio e las malautias diversas; quar son de las malautias a las quals les antics no diysero ni pausero propri instrument, per las formas de diversas specias.	But the skilled craftsmen find suitable instruments for themselves according to what the operation and various ailments signify; so they have instruments for the ailments to which ancient ones would not have assigned nor provided a specific instrument due to the diverse forms.
Mays si es trinquat l’os de la mandibula o dels autres osses de la boca, o si poyreys, lahoras sia pes curat sobre aquel en son loc am aquo que es a lu convenient dels instrumentz e de las forceps las quals havem dit en la extraccio de las razitz de las dentz, e ajuda te am gesti del qual aquesta es la forma:	But if the bone of the mandible or other bones in the mouth are pierced, or if puncturing is necessary, then use a point over that area in its place, according to what is convenient from the instruments and forceps which we have mentioned in the extraction of roots of teeth, and this is the form of the gesture:
E sia en lu alcuna grosseza petit a petit, e sia instringida o tenguda am la boca per que no evasesca o fuga entro que l’os de tot sia foro-getat; e aprop restaura le loc am medicinas convenientz ad aquo.	And let it be in him some small lump little by little, and be compressed or held at the mouth so that it does not escape or flee until all the bone is thoroughly treated; then place the area with suitable medicines for it.
Mays si en l’os es petita poyredura, lahoras ratz aquel de aquela poyredura e de la sua negror, e cura aquel entro que sia sanat.	If there is a small abscess in the bone, then drain that of the abscess and its blackness, and cure that until it is healed.
Capitol .xxxii.	Capitol.xxxii.
De la cura de las dentz eminentz sobre las autras.	Of the cure of the prominent teeth over others.
Quan las dentz so eminentz no segon lor cors natural per aquelas la forma es laga, e majorment quan endeve a las femnas, e majorment a las piuselas venerablas; donc cove que tu consideras: si dent es nada aprop autra dent, e no es possibla sarradura ni linament de lu, lahoras radica aquela; mays que no sia annexa am autra dent, lahoras tu inscideys aquela am aquest instrument del qual aquesta es la forma; e es semblant a morr de porc, e sia feyt de ferr de India de extramitat mot aguda.	When the teeth are prominent not according to their natural form, especially when they protrude in women, and particularly in venerable old women; therefore consider this: if a tooth is close to another tooth and it is impossible to extract or treat it with a needle, then remove that tooth; but if it is not attached to another tooth, then cut out that tooth using this instrument, which resembles the head of a pig, and made of Indian steel with an extremely sharp point.
E sia la tua inscizio am la qual inscideyses aquela en trops dias per la duricia de la dent, e que no sia comauguda autra de las dentz.	And let your incision be where you cut that in too many days due to the hardness of the tooth, and may it not be another of the teeth.
E si es dent eminent expausat a limadura, lahoras lima aquel am lima de ferr de India del qual aquesta es la forma:	And if the tooth is prominently protruding and needs to be filed, then file that with a file of Indian iron, which is of this form:
E sia tot de ferr de India e·l margua eysament; e sia de motz menutz puntz ayssi cum lima am la qual son faytas agulhas, am la qual la dent sia limada pauc a pauc en motz dias am fecilitat, per so que no sia autra dent comauguda e caga.	And let it be entirely of Indian iron; and let the margin be filed finely; and let it have small pointed teeth like a file, with which the tooth can be filed little by little over many days for ease, so that no other tooth may decay or fall out.
E aprop lineys aquela en la fi, e ratz aquela am alscus razoris.	Then lengthen it at the tip, and sharpen it with a few razors.
E si es dent del qual una partida es trinquada e lideys la lengua, lahoras cove que tu limescas aquel entro que l’aspretat de aquela fraccio sia ostada e engualhada, e sia aplenada per so que la lengua no ledesca ni la paraula no corrumpa.	And if it is a tooth of which one part is fractured and you file the tongue, then cut that such that the sharpness of that fracture is obstructed and equalized, and may it be filled so that the tongue does not hurt nor the word become corrupted.
Capitol .xxxiii.	Book XXXIII.
De restauracio de dentz maugudas am fiel de aur o de argent.	For the restoration of decayed teeth using gold or silver filler.
Quan accideys a las dentz devant concussio e remossio per percussio o per cazament, e le malaute no pot strenher sobre aquo que manga, e tu has curat aquel am medicinas stipticas, e no ha valgut la tua curacio, lahoras per so que no cagan es engen en aquelas que sian strengudas am fiel de aur e no de argent, quar argent se fa vert e aprop se poyreys aprop alscus dias, mays aur nul temps no es mudat.	When accidents occur to the front teeth due to concussion or removal by impact or during hunting, and the patient cannot strengthen what is left, and after treating it with astringent medicines your treatment has not been effective, then for those that are strong fill them with gold and not silver, because silver turns color and will likely leak in a few days, but gold does not change over time.
E sia le fiel en tal subtilitat e grocesa segon la quantitat que puesca entrar entre las dentz; e la forma de la reccio es que prenguas le fiel e pren lo doble de lu entre doas dentz sanas, e aprop que cresques am doas tortuositatz del fiel entre doas maugudas, o si’ una o motas, entro que pervengua la tela a la dent sana del autra partida.	And the filling should be in such subtlety and thickness according to the quantity that can enter between the teeth; and the form of the cavity is that you take the gold and place twice its amount between two healthy teeth, and soon it will appear with two twists of the gold between two decayed teeth, or if one or several, until the tissue reaches the healthy tooth on the other side.
E aprop itera le teyssiment entro a la partida de la qual comenciest, e strenh la tua ma am facilitat e savieza entro que no sia mauguda.	And then insert the tissue into the part where you started, and strengthen your hand with ease and skill until it is not decayed.
E sia la tua striccio am la qual strenhas le fiel deves las razitz de las dentz que no evasesca.	And let your bandage be such that it holds the tooth roots firmly in place so that they do not slip out.
E aprop inscindeys las extramitatz del fiel superfluens am las forceps o tosoyras, e agregua aquelas en quascun loc am gesti, e converteys aquelas e las occulta entre la dent sana e la dent mauguda, per so que no fassa lesio a la lengua.	And then divide the excess roots of the tooth with forceps or sharp scissors, and add them to any location with your hand, and place both in between the healthy tooth and the decayed one, so as not to injure the tongue.
E aprop leyssa aquela ayssi streyta cum roman.	And let it be thus tied like a Roman.
Mays si es desliada o rumpuda, strenh aquela o aquelas am autra fiel en tal manieyra en tot son temps.	If it is slipped or broken, hold it with another thread in such a manner throughout its length.
E aquesta es la forma de las dentz e la figura de la rectacio de doas dentz sanas e de doas maugudas, ayssi cum vezes aquestas liadas:	And this is the form of the teeth and the figure of the extraction of two healthy teeth and two decayed ones, as you see these tied:
E quan se fa que retorno una dent o doas aprop le cazement de quascuna en lors locs, e sian recrescutz ayssi cum havem recomtat, e que remauguan.	And when one returns a tooth or two to their proper place in their sockets, and they are grown back as we have described, and remain embedded.
E no fa aquo sino bo artifexs e savi.	And this is done by skilled artisans.
E alcunas veguadas es aptat alcuna causa dels osses de vaca, e es fayt de lor ayssi cum forma de dent, e es pausada en loc en le qual defayl la dent, e es strengit ayssi cum havem dit, e reman e serveys am aquel per lonc temps.	And sometimes it is suitable for certain causes of the bones of cattle, and it is made from them like a form of tooth, and is placed in the location where the tooth failed, and is strengthened as we have said, and remains and serves you long.
Capitol .xxxiv.	Chapter XXXIV.
De inscizio del liament le qual ve en la lengua e prohibeys loquela.	Of the incision of the ligament which we call and prohibit speech.
Aquest liguament le qual ve dejos la lengua alcunas veguadas o es natural am le qual hom nays, o accidental e accideys per plagua la qual ja es consolidada.	This ligament, which we call and sometimes leaves the tongue in some cases naturally as one is born, or accidentally due to a wound which has already healed.
E la operacio en lu es que huobres la boca del malaute, le sieu cap existent en le tieu se; e eleva la sieua lengua, e aprop inscideys aquel liament nervos segon la latitut entro que sia solvuda la lengua de la sua recencio.	And the operation is that one opens the patient's mouth, which contains the tongue; then raises the tongue, and then incises that ligament nerve according to the width between which the tongue can be freed from its attachment.
Mays si en aquela es alcuna duricia o denodacio, e aquo es stat per consolidacio de plagua, lahoras tu gieta unci e scindeys aquel per la latitut entro que aias inscindit le liament e sia dissolvuda la nodacio.	But if there is any hardness or induration in that area, and this is due to the healing of a wound, then you cut one time and incise that ligament nerve according to the width at which you have already incised the ligament and dissolved the induration.
E guarda te que no sia fayta fissura en le preon de la carn e que scindas aqui arceria e vengua flux de sanc.	And make sure that no crack is made in the subcutaneous layer, and carefully split here to avoid a flow of blood.
E aprop sia lavat le vestigi de la inscisio am ayguaros o am vi agre o am aygua frega; e aprop pausa dejos la lengua licini; so es meca la qual tengua le malaute dejos la lengua en quascuna nuoyt per so que no sia consolidat autra veguada.	And then wash the incision edges with warm water or apply a wet cloth; and place the tongue depressor over them; if needed, let it stay during each night to prevent the wound from becoming consolidated again.
Mays si accideys flux de sanc, pausa sobre le loc vetriol trissat; mays si le sanc ventz, lahoras cauteriza le loc am cauteri lantiginos le qual conveneys ad aquo.	But if there is a flow of blood, place a glass vessel over the area; but if the bleeding continues, then cauterize the location with a pointed cautery suitable for this purpose.
E aprop aquel cura am las autras causas entro que sia sanat.	And then apply other treatments as necessary until it is healed.
Capitol .xxxv.	Capitol.xxxv.
De extraccio de ranula dejos la lengua.	For the extraction of a ranula, use the tongue depressor.
Alcunas veguadas accideys dejos la lengua apostema asemblant a nomla petita prohibent la lengua de la sua operacio natural; e fort leu es magnificada entro que huempla la boca.	Sometimes, an abscess appears, causing the tongue to swell like a small lump, prohibiting its natural operation; and as it fills the mouth, the swelling becomes more significant.
E la operacio en lu es que huebras la boca del malaute sesent devant le solel e considera le apostema.	And the operation for this is to make an incision in the groin sixty centimeters in front of the pubis and consider the abscess.
E si tu le vezes de fusca color o de negra, dur, al qual le malaute no atroba sentiment, lahoras no toques aquel quar es cranc.	And if you see one of reddish-brown or black, hard, to which the patient feels no sensation, then do not touch that area.
E si es declinat a blancor, en le qual es humiditat, lahoras tu met le onci en lu, e inscideys aquel am spatum subtil, e inscindeys le de tota partida; e si sanc te ventz en la hora de la tua operacio, lahoras tu pausa desus zegi trissat, so es vetriol, entro que sia restreyt le sanc.	And if it has turned white, which indicates humidity, then you place the probe in it, and incise that area with a thin blade, and incise all parts; and if you notice blood during your operation, then pause above zegi trissat, which is vitriol, within which you restrain the blood.
E aprop retorna a la obra tua entro que lo haias trayt am compliment de lu, entro que sia lavat am vi agre e sal; e cura aquel am l’autra curacio ad aquo entro que sia sanat.	And then return to your work after having completed it, after it has been washed with wine and salt; and care for that with the other treatment until it is healed.
Capitol .xxxvi.	Capitol.xxxvi.
De extraccio de apostema de doas aurelhas e de aquel que es nada en le golayro e de las autras apostemas.	On the extraction of abscesses from both ears and those that occur in the throat, as well as other abscesses.
Quan endeveno en le golayro godat, so son glandulas las quals son asembladas algodat, las quals accideysso deforas e son nompnadas doas aurelhas, las quals quan tu las curas am aquo que havem dit en la divisio e no es sanat, lahoras tu considera si le apostema es dur, de fusca color, de pauc sentiment, lahoras no toques aquel am ferr.	When in the throat gout, so are their glands those which are gathered cotton-like, which occur externally and are named two ears, which when you cure them as we said in the division and it is not healed, then consider if the abscess is hard, of dusky color, of little sensation, then do not touch that with iron.
E si es de roga color e la razic es grossa, lahoras no toques aquela am ferr per le flux del sanc; abantz layssa aquel entro sia madurat, e lahoras o tu trauqueras aquel, o sira romput per si.	And if it is of red color and the root is large, then do not touch that with iron for the flow of blood; first let that mature, and then either you will incise it, or it will rupture by itself.
E si es de blanqua color, radon, e la razit de lu es subtil, lahoras aquel es que cove esser inscidit.	And if it is of white color, radish-like, and the root of it is fine, then that is to be incised.
E la operacio en lu es que consideras, denant la tua operacio, si ja ha repausat le apostema de lu caut am repaus complit o si es deminuit am alcuna deminucio; e lahoras fay sezer le malaute denant le soleyl, e·l cap de lu sia en le tieu se, e huebre la boca de lu, e le servidor prenent entre las suas mas prema la lengua de lu dejos am instrument mot noble del qual aquesta es la forma:	And the operation on it is that you consider, before your operation, if the abscess has fully matured and rested after cautery, or if it has diminished with some reduction; then make an incision in the morning before the sun, place its head in your lap, and open its mouth. The servant taking between his hands the patient's tongue, holds it with the most noble instrument of which this is the form:
E sia fayt de argent o de aram, e sia subtil cum cotel.	And it should be made of silver or copper, and very fine like a刀刃。显然，这里的“如刀刃”并不是正确的翻译，正确的翻译应该是：“And it should be made of silver or copper, and very thin like a blade.”
Donc cum tu premes am aquel la lengua e es mostrat a tu la apostema, e catz sobre aquel le tieu vezement, lahoras pren onci e fica aquel en l’amenla, e tira aquel a las partidas defora tant quant podes.	And when you press on that area with your finger and the abscess is shown to you, and you see it clearly over that spot, then take a needle and prick that area, and poke it outward as far as you can.
Otra aquo que tiras alcuna causa de las tunicas, e aprop incideys aquela am instrument del qual aquesta es la forma:	Another thing you do with some cause of the tunics, and then apply that to the area using an instrument of which this is the form:
e es asemblat a forceps, empero las extramitatz de lu son corvadas, ayssi que l’orrifici de quascuna de aquelas es en le endreyt del autra, mot agudas, le qual sia de ferr indi enbegut.	and it is similar to forceps, but the ends of these are curved, so that the orifice of each of those is in the straight part of the other, sharp points, which should be made of iron and well tempered.
Mays si aquest instrument no es a tu present, lahoras inscideys aquel am spatum del qual aquesta es la forma de lu: E sia agut de la una part, no agut del autra part.	And if this instrument is not at hand, then incise that area using an instrument of which this is the form: It should be sharp on one side, but not on the other.
E pus que has inscidit una mella, inscideys l’autra segon aquesta meteyssa manieyra de inscizio, e aprop la inscizio le malaute guarguarise de aygua frega	And after you have incised one wound, incise the other according to this method of incision, and then by incising, the patient will be cured with water.
Mays si endeve flux de sanc, guarguarise aygua de decoccio de scorsa de milgrana o de fuelha de mirtra e semblantz ad aquel de las causas stiptiquas entro que·l flux del sanc sia restreyt, e aprop cura aquel entro que sia sanat.	If there is a flow of blood, guard with water from decoction of herb of myrrh or leaf of holly and similar to that of the causes styptical until the flow of the blood is restrained, and then cure that among which it is healed.
E alcunas veguadas naysso en le guolayro autras apostemas otra aquelas doas aurelhas, e inscideys aquelas segon que yeu e dit en la inscizio de doas mellas engualment.	Sometimes this occurs in the throat, other abscesses elsewhere on the two ears, and incise those according to my judgment and as described in the incision of two mallets equally.
E yeu ja fu medicat una femna de apostema le qual era nat en le golayro de lu, le qual apostema tendia a color fusca, de pauc sentiment, le qual ja havia claus le golayro de lu, e la femna respirava am meat streyt, e ja havia prohibit a lu comestio e beure de aygua, e ja era pervenguda a la mort si mays agues stat per un dia o per dos.	And I had already treated a woman with an abscess which was located in her throat, which abscess had a dark color, little sensation, and had already closed her throat. The woman breathed very thinly, and had already been forbidden to eat and drink water, and she was nearing death if more water remained for one or two days.
E l’apostema ja tant havia pugat que havia mezes dos ramps entro que eyssiro per dos traucs.	And the abscess had already been pressing so long that it had been two weeks before it would heal through two incisions.
Donc yeu me cuytegui fisturalment e fiquegui en un de lor onci, e tiregui aquel, e atirada es de lu gran porcio, e aprop yeu incidigui aquela de on comprendegui del autre trau, e aprop yeu obrigui la boca de lu, e compremegui la sua lengua, e aprop yeu fiquegui le onci en aquela apostema.	Then I incised it forcefully and clamped one of her ounces, drew out that portion, and then incised the other, and closed its opening, held her tongue, and placed the ounce in the abscess.
E aprop yeu abscizi gran partida de lu, e no corria de lu sino un pauc de sanc.	And then you cut away a large part of it, and there was but little blood flowing from it.
Donc absolut es le guolayro de aquela femna, e comensec tantost beure aygua, e aprop presec vianda, donc yeu no cessegui inscidir de aquela apostema motas vetz per lonc temps, e succesia apostema en loc de aquel, le qual inscizia entro que es prolonguat aquel.	Therefore, the swelling was that woman's gout, and she began to drink water soon, and then consumed some food. Then I could not cease incising that abscess many times for a long time, and an abscess would occur in its place, which continued to swell as long as that lasted.
Donc yeu engen agui e cauterizegui le guolayro de lu, donc astec de addicio; e aprop yeu perambulegui e no saubi que fec Dieus de aquela aprop mi.	Therefore, I treated the gout on her and applied cautery; then I walked about and did not know what God had done to that one near me.
Capitol .xxxvii.	Capitol.xxxvii.
De inscizio de huvela quan es apostemada.	On incising the swelling when it is abscessed.
Quan catarr deysen a la huvula, e es apostemada e es longa, lahoras ela es nompnada perpendicular; e si es en la partida dejos grossa e redonda, e lahoras ela es apelada buba.	When catarrh affects the uvula, and it is abscessed and long, then it is named perpendicular; if it is in the part with a large and round swelling, then it is called a bubo.
Mays quan es curada am aquo que havem dit en la divisio, e no comfereys la tua curacio, e eyssament ja vezes que apostema caut ja es ostat de lu e es subtil, lahoras cove que tu inscidas aquela que es agreguadas redonda; e si es ad aquela longitut, e es sanguina, de fusca color o de negre, e no es a lu centiment, lahoras cove que tu temtes la inscizio de lu, quar en aquela es temor sobre le malaute.	When it is cured as we have said in the division, and you do not see your cure, then often you find that the abscess has already come to an end and become subtle. Then you should incise the one that is aggregated and round; if it is of a length, and is bloody, with a dusky or black color, and is not more than a centimeter, then you must fear the incision of it, for there is fear of gout in that.
E quan tu vezes aquela segon la manieyra que yeu he dita de la sua blancor e longuesa, que tu fassas sezer le malaute e premas la lengua de lu am instrument del qual procesic la sua forma e aprop fica le onci en la nuva, e tira aquela en jos e inscideys aquela am un de dos instrumentz les quals e ditz en la inscizio de dos mellas.	And when you see that according to the manner that I have said of its whiteness and length, you make an incision in the patient and probe the wound with an instrument of which it will take the shape and then place the onion inside the new opening, and pull that down and cut that with one of the two instruments which are called in the cutting of two bellies.
E cove que no inscidas aquela sino aquo que es ajustat sobre le terme natural ses addicio, quar si tu inscides de lu mays, lediyras le sieu parlar.	And make sure that you do not cut there but where it is attached to the natural term of addition, for if you cut beyond it, you will damage its function.
E aprop la inscizio, usa de aquo le qual havem recomtat en la inscizio de dos mellas, e cura aquela entro que sia sanat.	And near the incision, use what we have recommended in the cutting of two bellies, and cure that until it is healed.
Mays si era le malaute espaventat per la inscizio de lu, cove que use de engen en la cauterizacio de lu ses temor, e la manieyra del cauteri en lu no es sino am aygua aguda, e es que tu pauses le cap del malaute en le tieu se, e aprop prem la lengua de lu am le instrument le qual havem dit, e aprop pren de l’aygua la qual havem dita en le capitol de cauterizacio, e comfeys am aquela caus viva, e pausa aquela no spessa ni subtil, e de aquela omple la concavitat de l’estrument del qual aquesta es la forma:	And if the patient was frightened by the incision, make sure you use something to calm him during the cautery. The way of applying the cautery is simply with hot water. You place the head of the patient in your hand, and then probe the wound with the instrument we have mentioned. Then take from the water which we have described in the chapter on cautery, and apply it moderately but not too thin to the area, filling the cavity of the instrument whose shape this is:
Sia la extramitat de lu conquavitat en la qual sia pausada la medicina ayssi cum la conquavitat de culher de ray, e pausa le strument am la medicina sobre la vula, e·l malaute jagua sobre le sieu latz per so que corro saliva o musellage de la boca de aquel per la intrinscequa medicina, per so que no deyssenda de aquela deguna causa sobre le golayro de lu e que ledesca aquel.	Let the lower part of the cavity in which the medicine is placed be as wide as the width of a ray fish, and place the instrument on top of the medicine near the vulva, with the patient's buttocks below to catch any saliva or mucus from the mouth of the patient that might enter through the internal medicine, so that it does not get contaminated by this cause and spoils.
E aprop te la tua ma am la medicina, e exprem aquela sobre la uvula per l’espazi de miega hora entro que vegas aquela esser denegrada e sedada per la mordicacio de la medicina.	Place your hand on the medicine, and express it over the uvula for half an hour, until you see that it is darkened and saturated by the action of the medicine.
E si vols, prengues coto e envolopes aquel sobre la extremitat del ray, e submergeys le coto en la medicina, e entrometas le ray am le coto en una canula de sobre entro que·l coto adheresca en aquela canula, e fay aquo tantas vetz entro que consiegues aquo que vols de la cauterizacio de la uva, e aprop leyssa aquela quar ela se seccara e cayra aprop tres dias o quatre.	And if you wish, take some cloth and wrap it around the end of the ray, submerge the cloth in the medicine, and insert the ray through the cloth into a tube so that the cloth adheres within the tube. Do this several times until you achieve what you want from cauterizing the uvula, then let it dry and fall off in about three or four days.
E si indigeysses que iteras la medicina, itera aquela, e aprop la cauterizacio abstergeys en le circuit de la uva am coto enbegut en boder, e mondifica am aquel aquo que es en le circuit de lu de la medicina, e sia lavat am aygua frega, e sia curat deforo am embrocacio, e dedintz am guarguarismes entro que sia sanat.	And if you need to apply more medicine, apply it, and after cauterizing, clean the circuit of the uvula with a cloth soaked in vinegar, modify what is in the circuit of the uvula due to the medicine, and wash it with fresh water, treat externally with ointment, and internally with decoctions until it is healed.
E aquesta especia de curacio es pus salva que inscizio e pus long de temor.	And this method of treatment is safer than incision and shorter in duration of fear.
Alcunas veguadas es curada la uvuola am aquo que es pus subtil que cauteri e inscizio, quar es curat am subfumigacio en aquesta manieyra: recipe calament, ysop, origua, ruda, scicados arabic, camamilla, broyda e semblant ad aquels de las erbas, e ajusta totas aquelas causas, o alcunas de lor, en una ola, e sian submergidas am vi agre, e bulhan; e la ola sia be lutada am lut decentment, e sia en le mieg loc de la ola un trauc, sobre le qual sia pausat un instrument conquau de aram segon aquesta manieyra; sia fayt de argent o de aram.	Some cases of uvula pain are cured with what is finer than cautery and incision, which is treated by fumigation in this manner: take calamus, hyssop, origanum, rue, scikos arabicus, camomile, grind them into a paste similar to that of herbs, and adjust all these causes or some of them into one vessel, immerse them in water well boiled; let the vessel be covered properly, with an opening in the middle on which place an iron container according to this manner; make it of silver or iron.
E sia entromesa la extremitat en la boca del malaute entro que la vapor poge a la uvula sobre la quanula, entro que la uvula sia mot ofuscada.	And place the extremity in the mouth of the patient where the vapor rises to the uvula above the gullet, so that the uvula is well saturated.
